name: Ceiling Mouse
description:
Made in a week for Jame Gam #15

Move: Arrow Keys

Restart Level: R

Generate New Level: F

Toggle Sound: S

You are the mouse that lives in my ceiling. You need to find enough ceiling cheese to feed your family. 

You can jump as far as you want. But any ceiling tile you jump from falls down. 

Get the key and the minimum cheese needed to open the door.

Many traps block your path, so you'll have to go around.

So plan your moves.
